text: 02:01 I < e W8 CO0S1501-21-Y1: Group Allocation Details Â° comms@my.unisa.ac.za Yesterday To You Dear student, The tuition for module COS1501 will take place via a group site which can be found on myUnisa. You have been allocated to Group 2E and the eTutor for this group is Dr VM MELLO. Please visit myUnisa (https://my.unisa.ac.za) to access your particular group site which is C0S1501-21-Y1-2E. Should you have any further queries regarding your group allocation, please post these within the group site on myUnisa. Good luck with your studies, myUnisa Support Team & v Reply & Q
